comment: If you work in the cosmetics world. This ring light is a must have to take pictures of your clients. The lighting is beyond amazing.

There are literally no downfalls to this product. I was a little iffy purchasing this due to the price, but I am so thankful I did. My selfies and videos look so much better now!! It comes with two different covers to put over the ring light (warm and white) which I definitely appreciate so I can switch up my pics. I like to use the white mostly though, definitely for my makeup tutorials. It also comes with a carrying/storage bag for when you travel. If you‚Äôre a photographer, beauty blogger or just someone that loves taking bomb selfies, you should for sure get this!!
My photos or videos look better!

I love this ring light! It makes my videos look much better and provides that professional bright look I need. It was very easy to assemble and very easy to break down and place back into its travel bag. Definitely a great buy!!!
IN LOVE!! You can adjust lighting how much brightness you want to appear on your face and contrasting! I‚Äôm using this to do makeup video and modeling. I‚Äôm totally in love with this!

I ordered it to document my makeups... I am amazed on how powerful the light is! And how easy to assemble as well !Attached are pictures with the differenct coloured covers... the room's lights were completely off... I just had the ring light on. I took pictures with the lowest, medium, & highest intensity.

Super easy to set up. The ring light sits a bit heavy for the tripod but just angle it right and I should be good to go. It includes two filter options which are plastic covers for either white or warmer (orange) light. Wireless remote is a cute option but not the best function as it didn't always work. The tripod can accommodate screw in style accessories like phone or iPad mini holsters. The ring light must be plugged in which can get tricky if you're not close to a power outlet so be prepared to have an extension.  The light is super bright and has several settings but usually people don't want it too bright for when I use it at parties especially if the lights in the room are out, the light is more than enough at the first or second setting. I really enjoy this light and it's a perfect beginners kit that makes it look like you're a pro.

I purchased this product for my TikTok videos, etc. It works great! I love it! You can change the lighting from really dim to very bright! So whatever you prefer they have! It was pretty easy to assemble, and it‚Äôs a good size. I‚Äôm very happy with this purchase, I recommend!
I mean just look at the pictures. My skin looked flawless and bright. I was GLOWING. Like if i could have this light on my all the time, I seriously would.

Update: originally gave this a two star review due to a faulty cord and missing screw which meant it wouldn‚Äôt stand up however: the customer service team reached out to me to replace the faulty parts. I had just gotten rid of the light since it wasn‚Äôt working and sat around for 6 months. They replaced the entire thing.The replacement works famously. And the fact that they reached out to fix the issue meant a lot to me.

assembly was a bit confusing, but doable. ring light itself works well but sometimes flickers on and off and has to be re-plugged-in. major issue: tripod camera mount screw.while screwing the attachment into my camera as usual, the screw broke in half. part of it is still in my camera, which i am having to get professionally removed as to not damage the camera on my own.

Extremely disappointed with this product. I was so excited about this purchase. I assembled everything with no issue and the light worked just fine the first day. I took it down,  put it in the carrying case, and i havent touched it for 4 days. Today I set everything up to make a video and the light no longer works. Everything is plugged up and hooked up as it should be and the light wont turn on. Im soooooooo disappointed by this... Im going to email the manufacturer to see if something can be done. I dont reccomend this product to anyone at the moment.

The actual light is powerful, but the stand is TERRIBLY WOBBLY. See the video. It leans to one side,  which means all of my videos look like the camera is leaning to one side.  In order for my camera to be straight and balance, I have to put a folded up cardboard paper or something under one of the legs of the  tripod in order to get it to go straight up and down.  Also, the cord that connects from the power converter to the lighting fixture is defective. So by merely touching the cord the entire thing turns off.

It has totally increased my quality (I'm using the ring light in the picture shown) which is helping my views and subscribers etc. I love the filters and the bluetooth clicker is amazing, on the instructions it says that it's only compatible for the iPhone 5 and below but that's not true, you can pair it to any device with bluetooth capability.

Guys I need help! I seen so many amazing reviews so I decided to purchase this light... it came in i set it all up and it will not turn on.... I already threw away all the packaging it came in so idk what to do.. does anyone know any # I can call to get it replaced. I really wanted to love it I was so excited.. help üòìüòìEDIT: I called customer service and I left about 3 voicemails and I got a call back! ü•≥ I sent them the non-working ring light and I got sent a new one that so far is working great! I‚Äôm very happy with the way my problem was handeled and I would 100% recommended this ring light!

UPDATE‚Äî  I had previously written a review based on the fact that part of the mounting was defective- A brand rep reached out to me - sent me a new one immediately and walked me thru the set up ( turns out that unfortunately I did have a defective unit the first time around that I was completely unaware of)  after getting the new one and getting it set Up which literally took less then 5 minutes from start to finish - the ring lite is now perfect! Do NOT expect the seller to help-  if you have any issues at all contact the brand- seller is worthless! Light is perfect now - no issues at all! I want to add that the silver knob piece that is attached to the stand  (has a screw sticking out of the top of it) all you is place the ring lite on top of it and tighten the screw knob  that is attached to the ring light it looks like a wacky configuration because it doesn‚Äôt make sense logically why it would attach like that but it actually does work and that is exactly what you‚Äôre supposed to do once you unfold the arm that attaches to the ring light and you unscrew the knob so that you can see directly looking into it without the screw you simply placed that over that silver knob and then tighten the screw knob handle on the light itself. Hope this little tidbit is helpful  because really it is kind of a wacky configuration and it doesn‚Äôt seem like it would go together it seems like there would be a piece missing but nope that‚Äôs how it‚Äôs supposed to be the brand representative was so extremely helpful in getting me a new one and just reaching out to me literally after several several months I had used a defective one so like I said if you have any issues don‚Äôt waste your time contacting the seller just tried to reach out to the brand it‚Äôs self ! TY to mike for the excellent customer service!

I am so glad I‚Äôd purchased this item! I got the 18‚Äù and it‚Äôs perfect! The lighting is great and really make your photos pop. It came with everything in the description. The directions are included. Easy to put together and light weight.  However, the remote that comes with it isn‚Äôt compatible for iPhone users with a 6 or better.
No manual. No Stand.

UPDATE:After I was told that I would not be able to have my ring light replaced, I about gave up on this light. Just a couple days ago, the actual manufacturer reached out to me, concerned about my review. They were more than happy to offer to replace my faulty light, and although it was months after my light stopped working, I really appreciate the fact that the company cares for their customers. What‚Äôs even better is that they did one day shipping for my replacement! I‚Äôm highly pleased and would like to personally thank Cherry from Neewer for such amazing service. I will update again when my light comes in!
Works perfectly for recording gaming videos in your closet!

I bought this for YouTube videos and I love it. I currently use it at my vanity for makeup and skincare. It's a very bright (but adjustable) true white light. I love the fact that the light isn't a tube but many smaller LED lights making it less likely to break. The light & tripod break down very easily and fit into the transport bag quickly. The only thing I would ask for is for it to come with a better tripod. I am planning on buying a more sturdy tripod. The issue is that the light is heavier than (I think) is meant for THIS tripod, especially with a camera attached. Not a big deal, it's still a great product and worth the money.

i LOVE this ringlight. the package came with everything i needed to build it, and included a carrying case. it is brighter than i even need, and it‚Äôs so stable and dependable. this ringlight is perfect for doing your makeup or recording videos of makeup and taking pictures of your makeup. i included some pictures of what the lighting looks like on an iphone camera.

I was so excited to receive the this RING LIGHT.  I was planning on doing some awesome photo / video shoots right away with all the new equipment I just purchased.  After it was delivered.. i looked over the instructions, put all he parts together and plugged into the outlet.  Pressed the power button, but no light... nothing!  Frustrated... I contacted their one VIP customer support person through email and no response or support.  NOT HAPPY.  Looking to return for refund, but would rather it just be replaced to see how well it works.  CUSTOMER SUPPORT if you can read this.. please help out a not happy, frustrated customer.

New LuLaRoe consultant and was looking for decent lighting at a decent price. The dimmable feature is an excellent option. The Bluetooth remote to operate your camera is pretty great also. It took me less than 2 minutes to download the app, connect my Samsung galaxy s8plus and start shooting remotely. The soft tube pole extension (removable) is absolutely fantastic, you can tilt and angle the whole ring light and your camera all at once. I really like that the power cord isn't too small and has a decent length so you can move it a few feet away from the wall. The tripod has great extension and with a little tweaking and adjustment it isn't wonky and crooked like other reviews were mentioning. I included a photo to show the length of the cord. Also the tripod isn't even close to being fully extended in the photo. I really like this product.

Works great and as expected. Easy to set up and move around. Assists in taking great photos.The only complaint I have about it is the phone holder it comes with. It has a flexible ball joint and wasn‚Äôt holding the phone as steady as I needed when tilted at an angle because of this. I ended up finding and ordering a different one through amazon that works more like I need it to. (The Neewer smart phone holder) it attaches to this stand perfectly so now I have zero complaints.

The overall rating had to be 3 stars. This is because the unit would not power on. I had to remove the back panel to finish wiring the unit. Simple installation but this should have been completed to shipping to the consumer. I was going to send it back but I also thought I could fix it so I opted for the latter option. They red wires pushed in to locking terminations. The instructions were not helpful either. The product will now function as advertised hence the three star review. If your unit does not power on immediately remove the power source then the back panel to ensure all wires are correctly terminated. Push wires into slots until you hear a click. Too test the termination give the wire a little tug to make sure it does not pull out of the block.

I am hoping that it can be rectified with a product that works. I spent 10 minutes hooking it up without directions. After that, I turn the switch to on and nothing. I tried a few times and the led bulbs finally turned on. I checked all the connections and tried to turn it off and on again and no luck. There must be a problem with the switch. Of course, now I have to take it all back apart, package it up, and return it and hope the next one I get isn't defective. I sent an email to the seller in hopes that this can be expedited as I need this lighting system asap.Edited to add: I got another defective light. However this one took 1 month to stop working. Therefore it is passed the window to return it. I am out the money and still have to buy another light for my business. Unfortunate because it‚Äôs a nice light however the switch is faulty.

Is a good light to make  closeups videos, but didn‚Äôt work for me, I wear glasses and the light give me bright circle light on my glasses. I tryed diferent positions but i couldn‚Äôt find the way to have the iluminaci√≥n with out the reflection.

The instructions were not clear as to how to assemble the ring light. And it did not turn on immediately. After reading some of the reviews one person said to check the cables were properly connected. I disconnected and connected the cables and it did turn on after all. However, it should have turned on the first time around without going through that hassle. Other than than that the light itself is good.
Awesome product for the price.. Gets the job done for lighting that I needed
You must buy. I love this ring light!!! I'm a MUA and body artist and this is exactly what I needed. Perfect lighting to apply and take pictures or videos

This review is going to be a bit lengthy lol. First of all be prepared to receive absolutely NO instructions with this ring light whatsoever. You literally have to sit there and just play with it to figure out how to expand the tripod, how to snap the filters onto the ring light itself, how to mount the ring light onto the tripod once you've gotten the filters on, how to make sure everything is tightened down once fully assembled and finally, how to use the hot shoe camera and camera phone mounts that come with this set. (I haven't even begun to figure out how to use the Bluetooth remote that came with this set, and while I'm THRILLED this is included, it would be nice to have instructions on how to use it lol). This set includes TWO, I repeat TWO power cords, and one is for use in another country! This is great, but without instructions you'll be sitting there confused for a bit trying to figure out what to do with the darn thing. Very annoying!As far as the ring light itself, it's good. I'm a wig maker so I purchased the ring light to take better pictures of my mannequins wearing my wigs. I've attached 4 pics with this review, 2 pics taken with natural sunlight, and 2 taken with this ring light so you can decide for yourself which looks best. For me there wasn't a ton of difference. Natural sunlight looks just as beautiful as the ring light to be honest. The ring light did create more definition in the HAIR itself, but because of the ring light's brightness I lost definition in the mannequin. This kind of evened things out for me in terms of deciding which lighting, natural or ring light, is best for MY particular needs.
So far so good! I just purchased this today!I want to say, thank goodness it‚Äôs dimmable because it‚Äôs so bright, on high it‚Äôs blinding! Lol
This is my first time buying a ring light, I needed one for my Facebook live beauty videos and this is perfect. I'm a novice and I'm super happy with this product.
I spent a LOT of time window shopping for the best ring light option on Amazon. THIS ONE IS IT.Pros:
Everything I can ask for in a ring light. This thing's can get extremely bright or dim. Just awesome!

This is a great little lighting kit for under $100, but it's actually a no-go for me because I wear glasses, but that's not the fault of the kit but rather an inherent problem with run lights (they are notorious for glare).If you are looking to film or photograph yourself and no other subjects, with a cell phone or DSLR, at a short distance, this one kit is all you need. In other words, this is great for vlogging, selfies, or portrait work. It's not so great for interviewers where two people are on-screen.
I love my ringlight ! No piece was missing , easy to assemble less than 7 minutes ! Everything works !

This is the second time I am trying to purchase Ringlight from NEEWER and the second time it arrives without the tripod/stand kit.I wonder if anyone bothers to reach out to me and do good by me, unbelievable. If I could leave 0 stars, I would.
I‚Äôve had this for awhile but now that I‚Äôve opened it and put most of it together.  They sent me a different plug I can‚Äôt plug it in now I gotta order a converter just to use my light üòï

So far I am very happy with this product. I am a photographer and shoot with a full frame canon DSLR. I have always been intrigued by ring lights, but always felt I would never really use. I saw this product and figured the price was worthwhile as an intro. So far I am very happy. I only tested it out with my front facing camera on my iPhone, but I liked the results.The camera mount seems a bit too flimsy for me to trust putting my camera on it, but I have own tripod, so that is an easy workaround. I posted the pictures I took with my phone‚Äôs selfie camera. I‚Äôll do an update when I use an actual camera to give a final review.

Barely holds the phone, extremely hard to get into the phone attachment.  Pictures look washed out and unprofessional - looks much better in regular light. The entire set up is cheap and not worth $10.  I was really looking forward to it b/c of good reviews - but I'm convinced they are fake.  I tried to make it work with different cameras (all very high end that take great video/pics otherwise) as well as in different rooms and situations.  Washed out all of the colors. Gave it some time to really try to make work, now it's too late to return.  Very upset with this waste of $100.  Probably best to get something like this from an actual store.

I took some time to research which one I needed and wanted and am very pleased by my choice. This has been great. I needed something mobile and light, but effective. I've already shot a lot of quick video with this where I don't have to setup the whole studio to get great lighting and shots right.It's pretty straightforward. Easy to clip on the filters, I use white, not sure why you'd want to use orange but either way it's easy. The cord is long which is great, the holder for my iPhone works great. I've actually shot stuff in all conditions (night, daylight, garage, bathroom, etc...) it works great! The case is nice for travel and storage. Super simple breakdown and your off and going.

***UPDATE*** AFTER I LEFT THIS REVIEW THE COMPANY REACHED OUT TO ME VIA EMAIL. I HAVE SINCE RETURNED THE FAULTY LIGHT AND RECEIVED A REPLACEMENT.I purchased this ring light in October 2018 once I receive it I didn‚Äôt have any issues assembling it as many of the reviewers have stated it was very easy to assemble. I used it once the day after receiving it for an hour. It worked perfectly fine the light setting were great and just what I needed. After the first use I unplugged it and left it on the tripod for about a month without using it again. I went to use it three days ago and I plugged it in and the lights were flickering really bad so I turned it off and left it plugged in thinking maybe it needs to charge. I went back two hours later and the light never came on. Not even the flicker that it was doing before. I contacted the company multiple times via email and i haven‚Äôt received a response in three days so I called the number that the neewer company provides under every negative, yet truthful review and no one answered the phone and guess what, the voicemail is full.  This company has a faulty, cheap, poorly made malfunctioned product and they know it‚Äô but they choose to do nothing about it! I purchased the 4year warranty with an outside company and I tried to file a claim with them but they advise that my product is still covered under neewers manufacture warranty so it‚Äôs nothing that they can do until that one expires in a year! What‚Äôs the use of a manufacturers warranty if you can‚Äôt even get in contact with the company! Bad business and even worse customer service. I don‚Äôt have money to give away and I should have taken all the negative reviews into consideration and not purchased the product. Obviously this is an issue and the company doesn‚Äôt care as they‚Äôre still selling this faulty product!

I wanted something smaller the 18‚Äôis HUGE I wish I would of known but overall it‚Äôs works great I love it. I‚Äôve always wanted a ring light I really like the bag it comes with so I can take it with me anywhere I go to do peoples makeup

This Neewer Ring Light is my ideal choice, and it is easy to carry (bag included). It provides smooth, uniform illumination itself because objects receive light from all directions. I often use a mobile phone to shoot simple videos, and now even if I use snapchat, I will turn on this light.

I love this ring light! I've been wanting it for the longest. The tripod Is very sturdy and the ring is big enough to hold my Sony a5100 camera. Its perfect for YouTube videos and gives the perfect lighting.
WOW I LOOOOVE IT! It makes everything look professional. Mine came with instructions, wasn‚Äôt hard to put together and makes videos and pictures look GREAT!
Absolutely love this light! As a LipSense distributor, its sooo helpful for videos and selfies to show off color! I'm so glad I bought it!

I needed a new ring light for my on location makeup services. I was looking mainly for a light that was travel friendly, easy to assemble and take down, and had great light. It seemed this light would be perfect for me, the tripod was easy to figure out but once I attached the light, it seemed flimsy. That I can deal with my playing around with the tripod itself, but on only my second job one of the knobs broke completely and is now unable to use.
This light is worth buying for mobile phones as well, especially for newbies bloggers. I bought a small tripod to support this light, and it can be used on the desktop without problems. recommended.

This is a great light. I bought it for my daughter and I to use for photos and videos for work. I really like the picture quality we get with it and it seems so handy. We have probably used it 5-8 times over the past year that we have had it. The problem is it's unstable now and not very strong plastic, and the first time we took it apart to go mobile and shoot a video it fell apart, and now it does not stand up unless propped up. and it tips over eventually. I can't adjust it to have my camera inside it anymore. I hate to have to call this a loss since I barely got to use it and I really liked it and felt it was a good deal before it broke. I'm not even sure what part broke. I am wondering where I can call to see about buying just the tripod or stand (whatever it is called) replacement for it? If you are going to be moving this around or using it a lot I am not sure the quality is there since we barely used it but maybe it's a defective one hard to tell.

Hello I ordered a Neewer lamp just a week ago and when received it, it did not work when I plugged it in and was missing parts to it. It was missing some cords, the phone holder, the bluetooth clicker and more.  I was really looking forward to this lamp and have heard great reviews. If the seller could please contact me about this to ensure that this will not happen again when I reorder it would be greatly appreciated.Thank you

Love this light for makeup pictures. I also love how it comes with the two different colors to choose from. Only downfall is there is absolutely no instructions for it, but there are multiple YouTube videos on how-to put it together.

This product is beyond disappointing :( The lighting is not professional looking. And the materials that the tripod is made out of are so cheap - the screws don‚Äôt hold and the thing that‚Äôs supposed to hold the phone in place keeps on falling off the ring light because there‚Äôs no back support. I bought to advertise my products for my skin care business but I can‚Äôt use it because it‚Äôs more of a hassle than it should be. For what this is it should only cost a maximum of $25.00 instead of the $110 that I paid for it.I‚Äôd love to return but it‚Äôs probably too late.
Good choice for a ring light. I love the look that you get when using it. Really adds something that you don't get just from the phone's camera.

One of the best investments made for my content work. It's a great price for great quality. It's easy to assemble and take apart and I love that it's light enough to be able to take everywhere. I recently used the ringlight when shooting the first video for my YouTube channel for vegan recipes, VeganEats, and it really worked wonders and we were able to finish filming. It also works wonder for pictures. I have used it in a completely dark room and there is no extra light needed. 100% Recommended
I love my ring light however, when connected it sometimes turns off on its own. I believe the cable/battery is messed up. Package did arrive a little damaged on the outside and inside as well.

First time buying a ring light and wasn‚Äôt sure what to get. Instructions are funky but I figured it out I think. Like that it came with a carrying case and phone holder although I can‚Äôt keep my phone in its otter box defender case while in the holder it‚Äôs too big. Not entirely sure how it will fit a tablet because it is kind of a tight fit for my iPhone X. The phone holder part will slip out from the slot but I‚Äôm not sure if I set that part up right (again directions not good). Came with a Bluetooth remote not entirely sure what that‚Äôs for. Came with two covers an orange one and a white ish clear one. I put the orange one on because that‚Äôs what the picture had on it. The orange gAve a warmer tone which is good since I have brown skin, but the white was awful and gave bad flashback. Without either it was way too bright and gave bad flashback and was hard to focus camera. Even with orange was still hard to completely focus camera in some angles it would go out of focus. Comes with three cords not even sure what or where one of them goes but the one that plugs into light and connects to the other plugs into wall and the light will turn on. The ring light part of it doesn‚Äôt even go that bright without the covers so with the covers it‚Äôs still not bright.Should‚Äôve came with better instructions on how to set up, more info on the parts given and what they do especially with the Cords.

I was very hopeful that I would like this product but it is overall of low quality. One of the parts that connect the soft tube to the main tripod is lose. And it‚Äôs so much so that the ring can‚Äôt stand still while im using it.No, it‚Äôs not a problem caused by my lack of knowledge in assembling. The assembly is fairly easy. But the connector doesn‚Äôt work well.
This ring light is great. I had tried a different brand first that was cheaper and it fell apart after just a couple uses. This one is so much nicer and no issues. Beautiful results!

Just got it in the mail and excitedly set it up to find out when I plugged it in and went to switch it on that it doesn't work at all. Not even a dim glow or light up. Really upset cause this was highly recommended then when I finally saved the money to buy it I get sent a dud. Returning it and debating if I am going to reorder it or another brand.

I live in the U.S. and was super excited to order this, I received it all in one piece and not broken (thankfully). Easy to assemble with the directions, I go to plug it in and look at prongs on the cord and realize that it must have been manufactured for Europe and not the U.S., I feel if this is the case then it needs to be made clear to the buyer that they'll also have to purchase an outlet converter. I've also emailed the company that makes this product and still haven't received an answer almost a day later. At this time I still need to order a converter to see if my purchase even actually works, reason being why I left one star.

I bought this Oct. 9, 2017 and today is Jan. 3, 2018 and it stopped working. The LED lights have been flickering the past month while in use and today it won't turn on. Very disappointed because I am in the middle of photographing inventory. I can't find any troubleshooting or if the LED panels can be replaced or option of a new cord to buy. it's been less than 3 months using it so for the price this is unacceptable.

So I bought this light last July. I saw there were a couple of people with this issue of malfunction but I‚Äôd figure i would give it a couple months to see how I liked it. Well it‚Äôs been 5 months since I‚Äôve had and the light already don‚Äôt work properly! It flickers. Doesn‚Äôt turn on at times! I tried to contact Neewer and even though I received a clearly faulty item, they require us customers to pay for the shipping and packaging to get a replacement it. Due to the weight, that‚Äôs at least $30 out of my own pocket to get a one that works! To me that‚Äôs fraud ! I paid for something brand new which no longer works! To pay this much $ just for it to break in 5 months isn‚Äôt ridiculous. This is not a durable product and they don‚Äôt do much for their customers when their lights stop working. Stay away from it.

This is 18" in diameter, which is pretty big.  It comes with tripod that extends far enough to put this at least 8 feet up for good down lighting.The carrying case that it comes with only fits the light and the accessories.  The tripod will not fit in the carrying case.  However, the cardboard box the whole thing comes in has a handle and is compact enough to use a carrying case for the whole system.  The box is pretty sturdy, so it should last for a long time if you aren't using this thing and hauling it around all the time.  If you do use it a lot, the box might not last a year.

I prefer my Diva Ring over this.  The plastic covers are a pain to clip on perfectly and the orange covers just make me look orange.  I even used just two of them in hopes of getting a softer glow but the lighting overall still seemed a bit harsh.  The Diva Ring comes with a fabric cover which I feel softens the light up more.  I am not a professional so it could also be me not having the skill set to better understand how to manipulate the lighting...but for a beginner I have had no issues with the Diva Ring.
I received my ring light on time. I was excited to open my package but found out that there are missing pieces:- 61"/155cm light stand

This light was purchased for my daughter who loves to apply makeup.  She uses this along with her Hollywood vanity mirror.  This is a professional grade light that most makeup artists use when applying makeup and it is great for photographers as well.  It was easy to assemble and it also includes a bag that is easily transferrable and light weight when taking it to a friend's or relative's place.  The light is so bright and adjustable to your liking.  My daughter also uses it as her bedroom lighting.  This was one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon.  I highly recommend this light and the diameter size is perfect!

I‚Äôve been wanting this ring light for so long after seeing it being used all over YouTube and even in person! I do makeup so for me this was a must and I was beyond excited when I got it for Christmas! I set it all up that night turned it on and was in awe of how awesome it looked using my phone and video. The adjustable dimming feature was a great feature to see just how bright you could light up a dark room or if there‚Äôs not a lot of natural light around this would sure do the trick! The next day I decided to test it out to do makeup on a client and 30minutes into doing their makeup..... it made a pop noise.. and SHUT OFF! I tried messing with the cords, trying a different outlet, waiting for the adapter to cool down, NOTHING! It did not turn back on! I only had it for ONE day! And on top of that in the middle of doing a clients makeup. I really really wanted to like this light! I‚Äôve been wanting it for so long! I contacted Amazon about it and there was nothing to be done then to just return it. I don‚Äôt know if I just got a bad seed of the bunch but I packaged it back up after ONE day and sent it back! *tears*

This is a great light but I wish I had researched a bit more.  This package is missing some key pieces, like the accessory that holds your camera and a bendable insert on the stand.  I see now that you can buy just the light for$75 and the stand with these accessories for only $20 so that would have saved me $50. If you are going to buy this brand I suggest researching what comes with the stand to make sure you are getting the best price.

Quite shocked actually at the design and quality of this item considering it's origin.  There are a number of small design details which were great to have.  An example would be that the power cord for the light ring has about a 10" length of cord, then a detach point so when you move it you aren't dragging around a long cord.  In addition to that, the connector on it has a twist-to-lock type mechanism so it does not accidentally separate.The color filters for the ring are designed and made with good precision, so that they snap on really securely.
Great light! Loved it for the price it‚Äôs great

OMG! Lighting has been a real problem for me. I'm a vlogger, filmmaker and writer, so for my web site, I release videos of my creative process. A lot of times, the atmosphere should be intimate, not super bright. Other times, when I'm highlighting words on a page, I may want more brightness. So I needed a range of options, and I didn't want to buy a super expensive light fixture after spending so much already on a camera, lenses, etc. Someone told me about this light. Whoa! I had tried the small Neewer 216 light, and it's not enough-- it's more of a fill light. And sometimes I work late or early in the a.m., so I can't always catch natural light, which can be hit or miss. This light is incredible!NOTE: I also bought the diffuser cover separately (though it should be included anyway), and that may have made a difference in softness/look of the light. The test shots were lovely. Not too strong and bright; I wasn't awash in light. It was the perfect amount, which is what I've been lacking. I'm very excited about the possibilities with this!
In Wonderful Condition!Was Kinda Hard Following The Instructions But YouTube Videos Helped To Set Up
This light lets me take professional looking portraits for my website. It has paid for itself after just a couple uses.

I bought this light to use for lashing and microblading . It takes great pictures however when bent it‚Äôs very top heavy and you have to be careful not to let it tip over. The stand is kind of flimsy but if you don‚Äôt move it around much it will do. The light started malfunctioning after a little less than two months. Some days it works , some days it doesn‚Äôt , sometimes it randomly starts flickering or cuts all the way off. I contacted the manufacture but they wanted a video to show the issue when it happens, which is ridiculous because it‚Äôs random. The light was definitely not worth the money due to breaking so quickly

Got it in August. Broken in November. Also, the part that holds your camera falls off - like in the middle of a live and my phone didn't recognize the horizontal rotation making my video on the side. Can't use the light now broken- and with the camera stand sliding right out of the light circle -can't even use that without the light!!!!!!!!!

I have a bookstore that does weekly readings with authors. This ring light is a godsend for getting people through the meet and greet line. Before, it was a constant battle to get people to use their flash, which no matter how many times I told them, they would not turn it on. Their pictures never turned out and they would want to try again until they got a decent one. No more of that! Now it's one and done and the line keeps moving!
I've had it only a month and it quit working and I can't return it.I am very displeased.

I expected more from this since it had such great reviews. It's not awful by any means but it's VERY flimsy. I can tell it was built very cheaply (what do you expect from Neewer?). I think this is one of the cheapest ring lights of this size on Amazon, so you get what you pay for. The hot shoe adapter for DSLR cameras is SO cheap and crappy, so I suggest buying a different higher quality one to use. It can't even hold up an average sized DSLR camera, and consistently falls over.  The ringlight also doesn't fit comfortably inside the case/holder it comes with, even with constant rearranging.This is a great ringlight for beginners whether it be filming or taking. I will still use this until whenever it breaks. But if you want something more durable and easier to use, I suggest investing in a nicer one.

I bought this product in December and it worked really great used it a couple of times for video shoots and some still photography but after the six time using it it wouldn‚Äôt turn on.. I thought it was the outlet or the plug but nothing worked..  I contacted the company via email and I still haven‚Äôt received any response back. I know it‚Äôs still under warranty but it‚Äôs really hard to get in contact with anybody from the company in regards to troubleshooting why the lights won‚Äôt turn on ???  Or step to get a replacement??I‚Äôm just really disappointed, For the amount of money I spent on it; I expect it to last longer than three month

This light stand is cheaply made and broke after only a few uses. For as expensive as it is, it should not have broken. I tried to contact their customer service team to see if they could help replace the broken part, or if they could point me in the right direction to buy the piece to fix it, and they were very unhelpful, and said that the product was not under warranty so they couldn‚Äôt help with anything. Very disappointing poor customer service. The large heavy ring light sits on top of  skinny stand with a cheap piece of plastic connecting the two pieces together, this is the part where it broke. I was able to find the piece online, and hopefully it will work to fix this piece of junk, but it really would have been great if their customer service team would have stepped up to help at lest show me where I could buy the replacement piece. I would not recommend or repurchase.

I made the mistake of getting the UBeesize ring light first! It was total garbage (you get what you pay for). The light didn‚Äôt work and it was cheaply made; I don‚Äôt get the hype! I can only suspect I stumbled upon fake reviews because the light I got was trash. So I decided to pay a bit more and invest in the NEEWER ring light; WOW! I instantly could tell the product was made of quality material and it included a very nice carrying bag too. With COVID19 going on I was unable to shoot my new headshots for my commercial agent and needed to update my pics for a job I‚Äôm up for. This ring light made a huge difference; the Bluetooth selfie controller synced to my iPhone XS seamlessly! The ring light gets SUPER BRIGHT and can easily move from dim to blinding in seconds! Well worth the money! Also the seller Yishi was awesome! I communicated I was unable to track my package and he emailed me immediately. Yishi personally contacted UPS for me and it arrived shortly after. Above and beyond service. I‚Äôll update in a couple months to make sure the light still generates the same level of brightness etc. So far so good! Just pay a bit more and spare yourself the drama! Happy I did!

Upon arrival I was very excited to receive item. The first few videos and trips the item worked fine. Now I barely use it because I have to rig it for the item to stand in place. I am extremely disappointed my tripod and stand are already falling apart and it has been less than a year since purchase. One of the legs is extremely loose and the mount to hold my phone, not only barely fits around my phone but has completely fallen apart and I have to duck tape together to use. I am an online content creator and a fashion consultant. I like to take images of myself and my clients and I bought this because the case for travel, however, I find the case provides little to no protection for the pieces that really need to be protected, like the legs and the mount.

Price point is high for this. Don't let all the 5 star reviews fool you. For the price, I was expecting a much more solid product. The halo light itself seems very good, and bright. The tripod is very flimsy and cheap. I would not trust it under many working conditions. The tripod after all, is what is holding the main attraction of this product, plus your costly phone or ipad. Plus the mount itself that is attached to the light is very cheaply made. I would probably just return this if I did not have to use it the next couple weeks. I would recommend looking at other options to this light.

Omgosh I love this thing so much!!! I'm a bit of a perfectionist which sucks when you are trying to create product reviews via video for YouTube. It can literally take you hours to film one product review if you have terrible lighting that goes in and out with the Sun, especially if you live in an apartment with limited windows that are facing the Sun. Another day you might have too much sun and be completely washed out. This ring light will calm so much of my anxiety that I have around filming! I have been sitting on the fence about getting a ring light for over a year and I'm kicking myself now for how much literal hours I wasted when I could have just forked over the money and been satisfied all along. So far so good, worth every penny!!!

I use this lamp while doing manicures and pedicures. I like the different levels of brightness however, I thought it was an excellent purchase but I found out later that it wasn't. The Bar that holds the light has bent because of the weight of the light and also because of the weight, it tips over. I use a weighted shopping bag to hold it down and as you can see it wasn't strong enough to anchor it and it fell down. It has fallen on me and last night it tipped over again and this time it hit the floor. This is terrible and dangerous not only for me but my clients as well! I hope Amazon will do something about this so that it doesn't happen to anyone else again.

First, the light is AMAZING!  Its the perfect amount of lighting that I need and eliminates my other lights that take up so much room. I love the dimmer switch to control the amount of light I need for creating my art.  The reason I am giving this only a 3 is because the tripod sucks.  I am sure its ok if the light is set to sit straight up, but I need it to be at a 45 degree angle to face my table.  It can not handle the weight of this lamp, its the large 18 inch lamp.  It leans really bad, in fact I tried to raise it up a little high so it wouldn't be too close to the table and it leans really bad.  I had to make lots of adjustments to make it hold the weight for the angle that I need the lamp.  The goose neck part is nice, but I ended up not using it, it created another problem on its own.  It is a strong goose-neck and holds its shape very well.  But adding that part to extend the lamp out a little made the leaning part of the tripod even worse and was tipping over. Even with the light aligned with the foot.  I know how to use a tripod and understand how the balance works, so I feel that I set this up correctly.  I am going to keep this because I dont want to give up the awesome light.  Maybe later I will hunt for a better tripod.  My suggestion is to get the lamp separately and find a different way to support it.

I'll say I'm a bit miffed that this now sells for about half of what I paid in May. Had I gotten that low price I might given a better rating.Like the headline says, this isn't professional-grade gear. This is for regular people who either want more light to help with makeup or someone like me who just wants to put some well-lit photos online. In that respect, the ring light does what it says on the tin.

I would leave a 3, maybe 4 star rating if not for the scammy way that this light was sold to me. It was on a lightning deal where I got it for $80 before tax, saying that it's originally $99. Immediately after shipping it out the price went back down to its every day price of $74. Meaning they upped the price and put a lightning deal on it to trick people into paying more than the regular price for it. After that I can no longer trust "lightning deals" and I especially cannot trust this company for scamming people into overpaying for a simple light. As far as the light goes, it's ok. Nothing special. It's hard to set it up properly and the phone holder is a joke, it won't stay put for a moment so do NOT trust this thing to hold your $1,000+ cameras. I would return it and order a different one, or the same one to get the money back that they scammed me for, but that's a lot of trouble and I feel bad returning anything during a deadly pandemic. So you win this time Neewer, but if you want to keep the customers you get then stop scamming them.

This light is great for me taking pictures of my Wig Work. I was about to pay hundreds for a photoshoot for my wigs for my Website but was advised to try it myself first. This has been a great purchase so far. The light is Bright, comes with a dimmer switch and even has a place to sit your phone inside the right if you are making YouTube videos! This was a great buy and under $100 I can not beat it.

Pros: The ring light itself is really bright, and the diffuser pieces that snap on to it work great. I love that part.  It also has an external power supply, so if anything happens you can easily replace that.Cons: The stand has these obnoxiously long legs and taking it down to transport it is inconvenient and time consuming.  Most stands have the legs attached to a center piece that you simply pull up along the center shaft which automatically pulls all the legs in simultaneously.  Think of how a speaker stand works.  This stand however does not work anything like this although it has three legs that are connected together.  The legs fold vertically along the shaft, however the feet are pointing towards the sky, so you have to fully extend the legs parallel to the ground first, which takes up a lot of surface area, and then you kinda have to move all three legs simultaneously to get it to fold up (which wouldn't be difficult if we had four hands).  It's just incredibly annoying to deal with.  Also, it has a few components that interconnect to allow the ring light to be mounted to the stand.  All of these components just seem to be knobs that you tighten with no real locking mechanism that protects the ring light from lopping over if something gets loose.  So it feels very flimsy and unsecure.  If you're using this in one place that you don't intend to move it too much, it's fine, but for a make up artist that's on the go, this will frustrate you.  If you can find a better stand that the ring light can be mounted on, you'll love it though, because the ring light itself is a beast.  The stand is just garbage.
Excelente producto , llego en perfecto estado y con todos sus accesorios .

I spent $142 on this on May 17th... price dropped to $99 in LESS THAN 6 WEEKS! I just happened to see a suggestion which led me to this look for how much I paid for this light...The suggestion was for a $150 (+tax) ring light made by PIXEL.... Newer had the exactly same light that I really wanted in May, but it $200 and was far out of my budget... I really wanted the blue and red filters and the possibility to use it wirelessly in the future.... I sadly settled for the cheaper Neewer one instead.

On the one I have, which was the same price (this one had a coupon so I bought it instead) it had a nob for brightness and one for hue.  This has pain in the butt panels that you have to snap in and out.  I happen to be using this in the same place inside of my office, so I only have to find the right lighting once.  If you feel like you will be using this in multiple locations you might consider one that has the hue built in the bulb itself.

I have tried to use this 2 different times. Both times it would recognize my phone, I would set up to do a video, and then suddenly it would no longer connect to the remote. The entire reason I purchased this was so I could have a professional looking set up. That doesn‚Äôt happen, if I have to keep reaching for the camera. Extremely irritating as it never even looked good doing either pictures or videos. It always looked overly bright white. Very stark and harsh. So unhappy. I missed the return date because of everything that has been going on. Just had other more important things on my mind. :(

VERY BAD this is my second time buying this light and there‚Äôs always an issue that goes on. This time this light that got sent to me is SUPER sensitive and needs to be positioned a certain way for it to work, similar to when a Apple phone charger stops working and you need to hold it a certain way. All this money spent for nothing.

At first I was a little taken back by the fact that this item is so expensive, I did not want to invest this much on a light, but I bit the bullet and here we are.I film my videos with a web cam and the Ring light has a mount for all kinds of cameras. my webcam fit perfectly in it.

Baby! Grab a seat bc I gotta tell you about this ring light. It is awesome, it comes well packaged and in a cute little carrying case. The case is large enough to carry the light and all of its accessories to include any additional pieces you may want to purchase later, like a mirror *insert Rihanna side eye* but we‚Äôll get back to that later. It also has two side pockets on the inner sides of the case, I use mine for the 2 different light covers that are provided. That case has a little handle and an adjustable strap that makes it easy to carry. The light itself is of a very good quality, it gets super bright, like sunshine bright, and can dim all the way down. The Tripod is easily manipulated to adjust to however you want it. I like that I didn‚Äôt have to do too much screwing on with the tripod. The only things that you actually have to screw on is the light, the cell holder and the bendy extension piece. The two covers for the light (yellow/white) snap onto the light and slide into place. Each color has thee pieces to complete the ring. There are two screw holes to attach a mirror (sold separately). The fact that the mirror didn‚Äôt come included was a downer, but hey my fault for jumping to conclusions and not reading the product description *Kanye shrug*. It comes with a little pod, to take pictures and or start/stop a video recording. You just hold it on your hand and discreetly press the button and bam! Flawless! The pod is easily synced to your smartphone via Bluetooth and has a on/off switch to make sure the battery doesn‚Äôt drain while it‚Äôs not in use.Ok full disclosure on this part: I bypassed reading the instructions on how to assemble the thing because 1. I‚Äôm amazing 2. Who does that 3. I was so friggin excited!!!

I purchased this light to use for videoconferencing and filming videos.  I'm happy with the size of the ring, the ability to adjust the height of the tripod, the ability to adjust the brightness of the light, the different light filters (white and orange), and the shoe and phone adapter.  I also like that I can adjust the angle of the light--the top section of the tripod is bendable, and it holds the light in place well in any position.  I like the carrying case it comes with--it seems fairly sturdy and is padded to protect the equipment.  Lastly, I love the bluetooth remote that came with the kit.  I was able to easily connect it to my phone, which then allowed me to start and stop my phone's camera.  I didn't see the remote listed in the product description, so that was an unexpected and delightful surprise.

Originally I had a 10 " ring light that worked well and enhanced my photos but I was in need of a brighter and larger ring light. After doing much research I came across this one and was unsure as it cost significantly more than my first light.However, I am so happy I took the chance and bought this light as I am so satisfied with my purchase! This light came with everything listed on the picture/description and I really like the remote (works very fast) and the carrying case. I would also like to add that unlike other lights this light is very durable and all parts are made really well.

Bought this to make YouTube videos and take pictures for my insta. So far has been a blessing and gives me all the light I need for both. The orange filter is my favorite and I love the remote! The remote is the best part since I can take my own pictures without having to have someone else do it. I also love that my phone can attach to the light, which helps me easily get my lighting and camera angle in the best spot. Everyone should have one of these if they take a lot of pictures or make videos. It makes all the difference.

Sometimes you'll have to shake or wiggle the plug that goes into the adapter to get the light to work. And be careful if you're filming live or filming period and you accidentally bump the adapter... it'll shut the light off which is EXTREMELY inconvenient especially during a live stream. :/ I thought it was just the one I happened to receive, but I got a replacement and it does the *exact* same thing.Aside from that, it works great and it's very bright and makes make up videos so perfect... but that means little if the light keeps shutting off. :/ This would be great if you aren't doing any video. Photos would only be a pain if you can't get the light to come back on.

Honestly, I have reached out to customer service multiple time with no response. My ring light doesn't work 90% of the time and that‚Äôs not an exaggeration. I‚Äôm not one to write a negative review, I‚Äôve actually never written a review before in my life. But I‚Äôve also never encountered a customer service that just..doesn‚Äôt respond. I even went as far as their Instagram account, emails, calling the number they‚Äôve provided. I‚Äôve only had my ring light for a couple of months and I‚Äôve had problems with it from the start. I‚Äôd like to think I just received a defective one & it‚Äôs not the company itself!! Basically I‚Äôm just writing this so someone finally responds to me from customer service, please & thank you in advance

We had been working with this company lights for so many years and they never fail to give us the best possible light in our main studio, we use it to help us get a better whit infinite background when doing our podcasts, it comes with all you need to take it from on place to another, we sometimes take this one to friend's house when we want to take a really really good photo! Cheers!

While the longevity of the product is yet to be determined, it‚Äôs built pretty sturdy. It‚Äôs actually huge, bigger than I anticipated it to be, and really bright on the fullest setting, both of which are awesome. The stand it comes with is very adjustable, making it really easy to position just right, or to keep it balanced so it won‚Äôt fall over. I wish the phone holder was a little taller, but they provide the option to add other accessories, like a taller stand for your phone, further adding to the modular design of the product. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for great photography lighting!

I‚Äôm a freelance makeup artist and travel all over San Diego county glamming brides for weddings. I fell in love with this light but unfortunately it‚Äôs STOPPED WORKING on me after just 3 months! I even ordered a new adapter on amazon for $20 bucks only to find out IT STILL DOESNT TURN ON! I handled with the utmost care and it went out on me. I‚Äôve tried several times to communicate with the manufacturer but still NO HELP! What a waste!! $140 down the drain

My wife started teaching her fitness classes at home on zoom, like so many others.  We struggled with getting good light.  We tried a shop light with a sheet over it, floor lights, overhead lights and natural lighting but still struggled each day.  I bought the 18" ring light and it has worked well.  Fully adjustable, easy to use.Only complaint is the phone mount that is in the center of the ring doesn't accommodate a large phone with protective outer box.  It is designed for an iphone I think so if you have a Samsung 8,9 or 10 it will not fit well.  Also doesn't rotate to the vertical position.  We used a bean bag to set it up with some tape and it works rigged up.

This ring light is an awesome addition to any photographers kit. It works well with the included plastic snap-on diffusers, the cord is a decent length, and the brightness control gives you a good range. It isn't SUPER bright and doesn't have the best fill range, but for close up work and good soft portrait lighting it is very nice. The carrying case is definitely handy, and everything stores pretty neatly inside of it. The camera mount can feel a bit wonky with a full DSLR camera and lens attached, and the mount for placing it on a tripod isn't the sturdiest when tightened, but for the price it does the trick. Neewer has always been a 5-10 for me, meaning that many of their features and materials on a given product are a 10/10 while certain aspects, such as mounts or cables, are 5/10. But overall they seem to always be worth having in your inventory. This product is definitely one of the better pieces to have.

I thought the tripod was useless, so flimsy and wobbly and would bend under weight and almost tip over.  Not substantial.  It comes with a gooseneck mount so you can direct the circle light, but if you do lean it out there, the tripod wants to tip over. I got rid of the tripod and just mounted it to a substantial stand which I also purchased :  https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0096JYRY6/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o09_s01?ie=UTF8&psc=1The light lights things up well, wish it had some color temperature... it only has a dimmer, so getting the color temperature you need is a challenge.  You better like blueish light.

Product works sort of. The light part is great. Minus one start for the whole assembly being flimsy and swaying in windy conditions outdoors or even indoors after adjusting the light till it finally comes to rest. Also minus one star for not providing an offset piece that would elevate the smartphone more into the center of the ring. Smartphone fits OK when used in vertical orientation, doesn't fit well when used in horizontal orientation. The part exists but was not included in this version of the kit. It isn't missing from this kit, it purposefully isn't part of it. Also, haven't tried it with a heavy DLSR but I doubt that the assembly is stable enough for it. Decent hobbyist light.

I'm a digital creator and do a lot of product reviews  and this ring light is professional production quality. It gets so bright and also comes with the 3 orange plates for saturation. You can put 1, 2 or all 3 orange plates depending on the saturation level you want. It comes with a remote for easy stop and go filming. Even on social media applications like Snapchat, you can hold the remote down as long as you want to record a video. I absolutely loved this purchase!!! No regrets at all!

I‚Äôm giving it two stars because when I first got it, I was impressed because the ring light was very bright and I thought it was worth over $100. However, I tried using it again after two days of having it and it wouldn‚Äôt turn on. Then after leaving it ‚Äúon‚Äù for a few seconds the lights were beginning to turn on but it was very weak and the lights were pulsating. My experience with this ring light was very similar to someone else‚Äôs review on this product. I should‚Äôve taken that review more in consideration before buying. I‚Äôm definitely going to return it.

SIZE MATTERS. I already had a 10" ring light but this one just took my filming/selfie game from 0 to 100. It's very bright, & can light up an entire room without a problem. The orange plastic attachments are awesome & and give you the option to mix and match to create a warmer "filter." Set up is easy, easier if you've already set up a ring light in the past, but basically everything is common sense & just a little tip: the legs of the stand come outside-in so you need to push them all the way backwards so the screw on tip of the stand is on the top. It's worth the money.
I use this ring light for absolutely everything I‚Äôm actually thinking about purchasing a second one,  my only complaint is the shortage in the cord,  but other than that definitely a great bye!

The ease of set up and the quality of this light will be phenomenal for my webinars.  With a little tutorial from a friend ( who is a videography professional), I am set up for success along with my Logitech HD Pro Webcam C920 (also purchased via Amazon).  This in combination with using a gorilla pod wrapped around the light...I am so stoked for my webinars and teaching production.  Love the carrying case but I plan to already have things set up.
Ive purchased 3 of these lights from Neewer over the years. These lights are amazing.I have had my first light for 1 year and 5 months and it still operates normally.

The light itself is great, but the STAND can be improved a lot. It feels like one wrong move and something can break or the stand can TOPPLE over since it will be very top heavy with the light. All of the locks on it are also screws that seem to be made of plastic, and over time will probably wear down and not be able to lock anymore. It is definitely a product you want to be gentle with. I keep it up 24/7, only because I don't know if leaving it up all the time or disassembling it and assembling every time I need to use it would cause more damage. Also, another important thing to note, it comes with an AWFUL PHONE HOLDER. The holder feels like it can break each time you put your phone in, and it cannot keep the phone in place. Your phone, unless you balance it perfectly, will just roll around not secured. On top of this the bump on the bottom of the light intrudes on your phones space, and can make it difficult to use because the phone holder has no height adjustment. I also used the stand to hold a DSLR camera and I can honestly say I was terrified to leave it on the stand for even a second by itself. I think the Neewer ring light was great, but the stand left me very disappointed after I payed $100 for it.

I just started a Youtube channel, saw that lighting was the most important part of a video, and so I decided to buy this light in particular because ring lights are a Youtube staple, and this one is very inexpensive. I was able to put it together myself (before I found the instructions in the box) and when I turned it on it made a HUGE difference in my video quality (filming on my smartphone.) You can see my full review and the difference it made in my video aesthetics on my channel, GlamByKam. The video is called NEEWER 18" RING LIGHT | REVIEW + UNBOXING + SETUP. Hope this helps if you're on the fence about buying it.

I ordered this light last week and when it came it I was so happy! I had been searching for a good ring light for months until I decided to purchase this one. I figured out how to put it together and initially it worked perfectly, but when I tried to turn the light on again, it wouldn't turn on.  After fidgeting with the connection plug (twisting it, unplugging and re plugging it, wrapping it around the stem) eventually I got it to stay on. I only worry though that it will only get worse and eventually it will not be fixed with cord placement. Debating if I should return it.

Edit June 10, 2020: I contacted the seller about the faulty stand and they were amazing and courteous. They sent me a replacement and I received it today. So changed my review to 5 stars because it's an awesome ring light and they have great customer service too.Love this ring light! The only reason for the four stars is that one of the tripod legs is a little loose and won't stay as I want it to, but don't want the hassle of a return since it's a great light.

I chose this one with the carrying/storage case because I assumed it would be worth it but I honestly never use the bag because it so involved to set up and take down this setup - usually fold it up most of the way and stick in the corner until I want to use it again. I also think the tinted light covers are way too orange and create a weird shadowy glow that isn't really flattering or natural looking. That being said the stand is very adjustable which is nice and you can precisely adjust the light levels - great for multi-dimensional shots or indoor/outdoor use. It's a pretty good price for the quality and would be a great introductory set

This ring light is just amazing. I‚Äôm a television reporter and have to shoot my own tape pieces because of the pandemic. I was not going to catch myself looking a mess on TV with bad lighting! This was easy to set up and makes me look better than I‚Äôve ever looked even in studio lighting! My executives and everyone noticed! I got a cell phone rig that holds my phone horizontally because vertical video is not good for TV and this 20 dollar rig holds my wireless mic on a hot shoe mount and I sound great too! Bad audio and bad lighting is the worst but trust me this is the solution!!!

I was very much looking forward to this ring light, and for the price I was not expecting much. But much does not mean that the tripod would not fit well on one of the extensions, so i could not raised it much, and that after a couple of uses with the light on it fell down, gladly it felt over a bed, so the light suffered no damage. Even though I always have the care to place the light towards one of the legs, same use as with a camera tripod.So story short I had  to buy  a new stand.

Hey! One of my 2020 goals was to get back on Youtube and make more content for you. This is a great light for what I'm needing it for-amateur photography. My of my pictures are taken in my home so this light really steps the shot up and makes the lighting look beautiful and even. The only compliant I have is the is the phone holder that can be connected to the light is very limited. This ringlight is fantastic! I had gotten a small one for cosplay self-shoots and TikToks, but the tripod didn‚Äôt hold my phone very well and I just didn‚Äôt like it. My friend had this one and recommended it to me. I used it at her house and immediately bought my own. I use it regularly. I‚Äôve never used it on full brightness though I have blinded myself turning it on while standing in front of it.I especially like to use it while taking photos with my phone in ‚Äúportrait mode‚Äù with ‚Äúcontour lighting.‚Äù Doing it that way requires very little editing, if any.

Whenever I see multiple 5 star Reviews I'm always wary. I was excited about this product, it has over 7,000 reviews including videos. But once it arrived and set up I knew I'd gotten bamboozled. Firstly it did not turn on. At all. Secondly it's made very cheaply. If it did work I wouldn't pay more than 40. Marketed beautifully but really a Lemon. I use this almost every day. I take a lot of photos for my online reselling business and had heard about ring lights. My friend issues 2 in his hair salon. You‚Äôd think because it‚Äôs expensive it‚Äôll actually be worth something, purchased a little over a month ago I‚Äôve probably used it 6 times. A few days ago it just shut off and has not come back on. I‚Äôm very disappointed this is so inconvenient and trifling I wouldn‚Äôt recommend! my friend purchased after me and is having the same issue only hers comes on occasionally.

This light changed the game for me in every aspect possible! Wow is all I have to say. It was so incredibly easy to setup and would work perfect for freelance MUAs who travel because it‚Äôs incredibly easy to take apart and set back up. The height is adjustable and I imagine goes extremely high, Ive only ever had to use the first 2 extenders and I believe there is 4? Maybe 5. So she‚Äôs incredibly tall. The quality is out of this world, not flimsy in any sort of way. I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this ring light, it fits my MUA/MUE lifestyle perfectly.

I love my ring light because I can see very little nook and cranny that the face has. As a licensed Cosmetologist and certified Makeup Artist, I needed a  ring light that I can use and functions properly so that I can post pictures of the hair and makeup that I do.  This light has a little knob you can turn to shine the exact amount of light you need for excellent pictures. Another wonderful quality is that it comes with a tripod and the instructions are super easy to use.  The Neewer Ring Light also comes with a carrying case which is beneficial if you have weddings, special occasions, SFX, etc, and it is light to carry and portable. I absolutely recommend it. I love my ring light!

NEEWER is not new to the game. It has become one of the top ring lights and for good reason! I have been waiting for years to get my hands on one, and I'm so incredibly glad I have one now! This light is everything I need. I also use it for a room lamp because my space does not have overhead lighting. It is great. I love it and highly recommend to anyone in photography, gaming, streaming, or just in need of some great lighting for a space.

When the light works, the brightness is great for photography and task lighting.  HOWEVER, the switch breaks EXTREMELY quickly.  We've purchased several of these units for work and half of the lighting switches broke within a few months.  They stop making the full connection required to turn on the light and the switch even appears loose and will even move backwards a little on its own when released. Lots of people online have posted about the same issue so Neewer clearly has a serious problem with the design.  They're responsive with emails alerting them to this problem, but inconsistent with the information provided.  Some purchasers with this same problem have posted on Amazon and other sites that Neewer mailed them a replacement part.  With us, they were unwilling to mail parts and are insisting we, at our expense, ship them the light to be fixed.  The shipping cost is about the same price as a new light so it their "solution" not an option.  It's pretty bad customer service to tell some purchasers they'll ship the part to them but not to others.  Neewer needs to fix the design flaw that seems to plague their lights.  If the faulty switch problem is fixed, it would be a great light.  While responsiveness is nice with customer service, if it doesn't actually solve the problem, it's just a way for dissatisfied customers to be superficially placated.  The other option is for Neewer to price the light more in line with a disposable product - once in awhile there will be promo code out there for 50% off - that's the only time it's worth the price  But at the current price, it's far too much money for the quality.

This ring light doesn‚Äôt work. I barely ordered on May 2019, don‚Äôt remember the exact day. I opened the box from amazon. Inside was the box from Neewer with my ring light. After 2 weeks I only used this ring light 5 times! Only five times! And now it doesn‚Äôt want to turn on. It looks like if the little (dot) lights don‚Äôt want to turn on. Nobody else is around my ring light, I did take care of my ring light and now it does not work. This is not fair. I was looking for a great ring light but this was not the one. I trusted the brand NEEWER. Now I see it‚Äôs not real! This is a real disappointment.  People, be careful. Do not spend your money on this if you are limited economically.I did try to return it and i hope I can do that.

I would like to say that this light is very bright and is helpful for getting good lighting as a makeup artist working in unpredictable situations. The crappy thing about this light is that it is so terribly made. Everything always comes apart when I put it back in the bag for travel. There are these filter panels over the actual light that always come off and is a pain to put back on. Also, when I place the ring on the tri-pod, I legit feel like it might fall over and it has once. It's like the light is too big for the tripod. They should really work on improving the quality of the product. I would rather save up and purchase "The Makeup Light" next time.

My original cell phone clip holder recently broke- the spring had always been incredibly difficult to maneuver. Neewer sent this new version, which screws/unscrews to hold phone in place and change direction. It is such a WONDERFUL improvement on the old phone holder! Thumbs up to Neewer for this!The only thing I would change on this ring light model is that I wish the tint of the lights could also be adjusted via a knob like the brightness. I'm constantly having to switch the orange and white plates out to light myself properly, and sometimes I wish there was a more in-between shade. One of the tripod legs is also a little bit looser than the others, causing the rig to tilt slightly at times. Other than that, not to shabby for a model existing under $100, which had been my main concern when first purchasing. It definitely does the trick for online meetings and providing great  light for video recordings!

I had to order this product twice. The first time it was shipped via Amazon and on delivery day I got a message that it was damaged and undeliverable.  Amazon told me to order another one.  Seems to me they would have automatically shipped a replacement.  I was afraid I was going to lose the coupon value I had used, but fortunately it was still valid.  As an added note, I contacted my seller, Global_omo, about my concerns, and they were very prompt and nice in their response.The second one was shipped via UPS and arrived in good condition. The product box was packed in a bigger box that was about one to two inches bigger than the product box all around.  There was a single sheet of brown wrapping paper laid on top of the product box. I really don‚Äôt know the purpose of the paper, what it was supposed to protect.  It certainly couldn‚Äôt secure the product box and the product box could easily slide around.  Fortunately it was undamaged.

Im really happy with this ring light and it works great!! Easy to set up, easy to store away. I like the stepless brightness dial and the option to have warm or cool filters. I do think the iPhone hold feels like it could break over time and putting it in vertical position with the ring light is a little tight. I also would never mount a real DSLR on that holder, just have a solid tripod hold the camera and put the ring light around it. I wouldn‚Äôt say this product is perfect, but it definitely does its job well.

First off I received my ring light got delivered. I was excited to open the box. The box looked like it had been open before but that was no big deal because everything came in peace and all there. I'm using it for my YouTube channel it gets really bright you could buy a softbox sheet to cover it. My pictures and videos  look betterThank you üòä
Easy to assemble, comes with good accessories and dimmable! I took this selfie from my iPhone with the light
This is exactly what I was looking for to enhance my makeup business!!

This is my second ring light I have ordered. Ad a pro makeup artist best lighting is imperitive. I ha e even sent other artists the link to order the same light as I love how the light itself works. Love Neewer products in general. Ive been wanting a ring light and finally bought this one when it was on sale! Love it. I sell clothes online , youtube, and streaming. I‚Äôve been trying to find a LED ring light for the longest time, however, my budget always stopped me. I came across this one the other night and I thought I‚Äôd give it a try. It is perfect, you can adjust the height, it has the screens for white or ‚Äútan‚Äù effect, it brings the adapter for the phone, super easy to use, and it brings its own case and bluetooth clicker. Very good quality in everything and super bright (which you have the option to dim). So if you‚Äôre looking for one and don‚Äôt have much experience or space, this is perfect!

Day One - 7/29/20This LED ring light is guaranteed to light AT LEAST an entire 10'√ó15' room just like daylight. In the photos I included one warm light cover and left an empty slot to show what each looks like when lit. It's definitely 18" - a lot larger than your average table ring light. It can be used for many different types of photography, both indoors and out! The phone holder is kind of awkward to mess with but it still works for what it is and grips the phone securely. My last concern is the stand; it's much lighter than expected and the legs are quite thin. The light itself is just under 3lbs. I'm clumsy, so I fear I will bump it and easily tip it over.

I'm not sure if everyone's is like this, but I do a lot of product photography for my boutique and let me tell you, this thing is not adaptable. I sometimes need to raise it really high or have it really low and it is so top heavy that it falls over. Not only that the adjustments are so weak that the legs are constantly spreading apart. I was really looking forward to this because it's an 18 in and it was recommended to me, but the person who recommended it, leaves it in one spot all the time where I'm constantly needing to take it on the move. The worst part, is when I have it set up and I'm not moving it because I need it in the same spot the next day, you have to unplug it every where it plugs in (light to adapter, adapter to the wall), just to get it to turn on. Sometimes it takes minutes before it will even turn on at all.

I love my ring light. The lightning has different setting that you can adjust to your liking. The lightning is perfect for videos/photos. Very easy to put together and comes with instructions. My photos are going to look amazing! I‚Äôd definitely recommend to friends/family.

This is a great product and a great deal for all that you get.  First, it's a tripod that is taller than me and taller than I can even reach.  It seems sturdy and well-made.  Second, it has a large ring light you can attach to the tripod that has 2 different color diffusers.  Third, it even comes with a little remote control that pairs through Bluetooth with your cell phone, and which can be used independently of the tripod and ring light.  The whole thing was a little intimidating, but took only 10 minutes to assemble.

This light is the best purchase that I made this year, I am so happy. Hopefully the photos that I attached with help someone decide if they want this. It is dimmable and has a wide range of brightness.
