The light itself is really good, BUT the ring brings two different options for the tone of the light. That keeps falling off even when I readjust it.Also, the tripod is not stable. Soooooo nice. Have had my light for a few years now and I have beat this thing up! This is probably my third ring light, but my first time buying this brand and I can safely say that I will now be a life long happy customer. Here are some of the pictures i have taken with the light and im in love. The  only bad thing i can say is that the phone clip thing doesn't fit  my XR 10 iphone.Follow my wig page  @wigsbyneisha

I personally bought this ring light to up my social media game.. whatever platform you‚Äôre on in social media this will DEFINITELY boost your quality in pictures and videos. It doesn‚Äôt take up too much space either. I love love love it!!

I did a good deal of research online and watched several videos on YouTube (assembly and reviews) prior to purchasing this ring light and finally I ordered it. It arrived very well packaged and was very easy to assemble.  After I placed my order I started second guessing myself on the size thinking maybe I should have ordered the next size down or two.  Brought out the measuring tape a few times still second guessing my decision and I am so glad I did not change my mind. This light on it's highest setting (which I did not take a picture of) is insane.  The size is absolutely perfect!  I love how easy it is to assemble and use, love the twist knob for the dimmer, love how lightweight it is and the case that it comes with is very high-quality for ease of portability.

Everything works well but the top reason I bought it for DOESnot work! Honestly I managed to overlook that but now I'm in June and the thing collapsed on me and none of adjustments are working. I regret ever buying this.

Awesome ring light - I purchased a NEEWER Ring Light 4 years ago and this one is soo much better. only giving 4 stars because mine didn't come with the adapter part for the smartphone mount. Sucks. My first order actually got lost and I had to reorder and now this one is missing the mount that sticks onto the ring light but seems to for some reason have just the expandable smartphone mount part (the one that you put your smartphone into).

My hair salon has had one for a long time and I always take pics with it when I go there... so I finally invested in one myself, and it was the best purchase ever. I mean the price is amazing and it comes with a freaking Bluetooth remote to take pics with your phone. Like how could you not buy one? My selfie game is hella strong now y‚Äôall.

Great light for selfies, art or for videography! Easy to carry around due to lightweight design although can be difficult to put back in bag. Had some difficulty with getting the phone attachment to hold a larger cell (iPhone 7+) but worked well with the smaller phones. Light is bright and you can change the power to adjust to your specific need. Great value!

Although it has great light quality, it is very unstable. There isn‚Äôt a time that we use it that I don‚Äôt worry about it falling over and breaking. I wish it was possible to buy a new base separately. Maybe I will follow up with customer service... for the money I expected better

The ring light sits a bit heavy for the tripod but just angle it right and I should be good to go. It includes two filter options which are plastic covers for either white or warmer (orange) light. Wireless remote is a cute option but not the best function as it didn't always work. The tripod can accommodate screw in style accessories like phone or iPad mini holsters. The ring light must be plugged in which can get tricky if you're not close to a power outlet so be prepared to have an extension. The light is super bright and has several settings but usually people don't want it too bright for when I use it at parties especially if the lights in the room are out, the light is more than enough at the first or second setting. I really enjoy this light and it's a perfect beginners kit that makes it look like you're a pro!!!!

I really like this light kit.  I photograph my clients before and after pictures to use in allowing them to see the difference my services do for them.  My pictures before I got the ring kit were okay but not real either.  The light ring kit has changed that for me and my pictures are really good now using the same camera.  I am very impressed with this product and recommend it for those who want to make their photos pop.

The light itself is 5 stars. Super bright and once you pop on the diffuser leaves a nice soft glow. Problem is it is made so cheap and flimsy.  Stand fell apart on second use and clip to attach light to stand is a cheap flimsy plastic.  The lights to heavy so it doesn‚Äôt hold it straight and all my video is slightly crooked. It could be amazing if they just made at attachments a little more solid.  Until then it got returned

I have just started using this product and I love the way the light works with pictures HOWEVER, sadly the stand is very unstable!! I am worried when I put any devices on it that it may fall. I just discovered today there is a pin that is missing from the stand. so the bottom portion is just ready to fall out anytime!I love the light itself but if the stand isnt sturdy. I do not know what to do so if anyone has stands they can recommend please comment below. Otherwise be aware this one isnt really worth it, just buy the light and find a different stand.

This item came as a international European plug shown on the photo that I attached . I‚Äôm from America . I brought this with my prime membership  account to get it one or two business days to film today and now it a waste  of time. I can‚Äôt film the way I wanted too . Very unprofessional . My husband bought this for me as a gift, been wanting something like this for a while! I love it! You can adjust the lighting with the small knob that‚Äôs on it. The ring light is big! Great for salons, makeup artists, bloggers, selfies, the list goes on! It‚Äôs easy to carry in the carry bag that it comes with, but I wish you could also fit the ring lights stand in the bag too. The stand makes the lighting adjustable too at different angles, side, up, down tilt etc. and you can also add on a phone holder in the middle too sold separately.

This was easy to set up but I did look at instructions to make sure I didn‚Äôt do any of the ‚ÄúDont‚Äôs‚Äù. Very bright ring light.  Has an attachment for either cell phone or go pro or camera.  Also the Bluetooth remote that paired with my iPhone XS Max is a plus.  I can set up my cell and have the remote in my hand to capture pictures. At first i didn‚Äôt know whether to put both color filter plastics or one but I figured out you choose one.  Very sturdy feeling comes with carrying case and I love that you can dim the light to your liking.

Must have for any photographer/videographer. Ideal even if you're on a budget. The tripod is sturdy and folds down so it's very manageable for transporting when compacted. I use it as my main light source and it adequately gives me all the light I need. The dimmer works wonderful for adjusting various lighting situations. I mostly use these for making videos on my phone with the included mount for my youtube channel. I have found the quality of the videos to be much better now that I have a real set up. I can take it anywhere since all the pieces are detachable and I use the carrying case to make it easier to transport the ring light to different locations to film. Very happy with the lighting.

I have now had this product in my possession for over a year, and it still seems brand new. It comes with interchangeable plates that you can switch out if you want warm or cool lighting. I've used it with my vlogging camera, as well as my cell phone. I love that you can change the angle and height in any way that you want. Most days I used it upright for direct lighting. I've also used it higher up, facing down, to add light from overhead. I've recorded many videos and took some awesome photos with this ring light. It's easy to store and put away in the carrying case it comes with. Super happy with it!

I purchased this ring light a little over a month ago based off a friend's recommendation.  When I first turned it on, I noticed that it was glitching and I had to manipulate the cord to make the light stay on.  I didn't think much about it. Well today, I attempted to use the light and it will not turn on.  I have only had this product for 32 days.  I am extremely disappointed.  This ring light is useless and it's past the return date.  If the seller doesn't allow me to replace it, I will be out of $100.00.

I have found this to be a reliable, compact, quiet and pretty handy lighting kit. I've had for a year and it has been easy to set up and break down, always works even if its been months since used. For the price I think it works quite well for illumination! The plastic filter pieces for the lighting ring are a bit cheesey and don't exactly lock in place like I would like but I'm living with it.

So far I've used my smartphone with it. I like the amount of light it shines on the face. Also, that it serves as a tripod. What I really dislike are those solid white circles reflected around your pupils in portraits and in videos. You really have to turn the light way down to soften them. More so in portraits. Making it obvious to everyone you're using a ring light. It would be smart if someone designed one of these with maybe the camera holder on the side of the ring light or beneath it (I'm not a lighting expert so not sure which would work better) instead of the center. Had I known of this effect, I may have rethought my purchase. I also don't like that the phone holder squeezes the hell out of your phone. That should be redesigned. Also, I received a solid neck instead of a flex neck that was advertised both on Amazon as well as on the box. I'm assuming it's because I purchased the larger size and due to the weight of the ring a flex neck would have made the apparatus topple over.

I love this light. It came with the Bluetooth remote so that I can easily snap photos of myself while servicing my makeup clients. The filters snap on and off easily and I don't feel like I'm about to break anything while changing them. The case fits everything that I need so less stuff to carry. Overall, I would purchase this product again as a gift for anyone who needs it. Stop reading these reviews and add this to your cart already! LOL

I just got my light today, and I LOVE IT. So why three stars you ask? Well because it doesn't work unless you finagle the power cord fixed to the light. There's a short in the wire and if you move the light you risk losing power. Given that there is a short, the light will also turn off at random even if you don't move the cord. I will update this review once customer service mails me back.

Me gusta porque lo puedo llevar donde quiera. El cel solo se puede poner horizontalmente y asi no me sirve, no lo uso, pues me conviene verticalmente. Las luces del anillo encendieron a su maxima potencia, en 4 ocasiones, cuando lo estaba instalando.. luego solo encienden a mediana potencia, a solo minutos de tenerlo en mis manos... es el unico fallo que le ecuentro.. dejo de funcionar la luz a su maxima potencia. Para ser tan caro, este producto, tiene muchos fallos. El bluetooth, todavia no lo uso.

I have been using this regularly for meetings and it has served me really well. It is bright enough and does help brighten up my surroundings. I cannot wait to use it during virtual instruction with my students this fall. For the price, it does include a lot of stuff in it and they are all helpful to keep video, picture taking or just brightening your face up for conference calls. I am not excited for the time when the bulbs will have to be replaced, though. Hopefully, an affordable replacement will be available then.

Tripod does not fit in the soft case with light. The case is made only for the ring light. you'll need another bag to carry the tripod, cords and any accessories you use. I was expecting it all to fit in the case provided, which is important because I'll use this in different locations. Now I realize the illustration in the ad is the box it gets shipped in. Stuffing the tripod in the soft case would certainly damage the light.

The stand for this light is more sturdy than I had expected, the plastic mounting piece on the light itself feels like it could break at any given time. I was impressed with how bright it can get and I love the dimmer. God this thing is bright even Ray Charles could see it a mile away. I received instructions with mine unlike many others, also the mirror for the light was missing. I've purchased Neewer products in the past where items that were supposed to be included came up missing...idk over all I'm happy with it though.

The light would be perfect if the cord didn‚Äôt break so easily, I don‚Äôt understand how it‚Äôs been broken twice when I take such good care of it. It doesn‚Äôt sit out after appointments and always gets put back nicely. I even got a warranty because I knew something would happen, they seem to be refusing to help fix it now that it went out the second time (the first time it got sent to me broken, it‚Äôs only the cord box that needs replaced). Very cheap for the price I paid and now they won‚Äôt send a new cord even though I paid extra for that warranty. I never write reviews if this tells you how I‚Äôm feeling. Very disappointed

I enjoy the Ring Light immensely. It definitely does its job in lighting up a room and making a photo or video more appealing to the eye. The extension on the tripod is difficult at first, but I suggest putting the Light on and then adjusting the extension! Otherwise it will be difficult and could be even impossible (I barely was able to make it curve until I added the Ring Light on it, then it moved down no problem). My only complaint is the smart phone holder. Another buyer who had recommended Ring Light had the same issue. The stand is only a bit wider than the average iPhone, in my opinion. My LG Thin cannot fit horizontally or vertically with or without its case, and so I will have to buy a separate stand. Guess I should have expected that since the ad shows an Apple phone only (it doesn't go any taller than that).

Great light, looks to be fairly sturdy and decent quality. Wish the color filter snaps were a bit better designed, and I wish there was more height adjustability. In many situations it‚Äôs just a little too high and there‚Äôs no way to lower it at all.

It's a really great lighting system! I bought it for photographing clothing, actually... I prefer natural light, but I currently live in a dark environment with not a lot of natural light and needed something quick to photograph my clothes. The light is extremely bright and comes with different covers.I'm still trying to figure out the best set-up for me; sometimes I have to readjust the brightness down because it's too bright. I take photos with my iPhone and most of the time the white balance is off, but it could be from other elements.

Cool ring light however the holder for the phone is thick and annoying to deal with and adjust. The Bluetooth remote disconnects it self frequently meaning you think you‚Äôre taking photos, and it‚Äôs not. Also, when the Bluetooth remote is hooked to your phone it for whatever reason disables the ability to use your keyboard on your phone which is stupid and unnecessary so if you‚Äôre doing a photo shoot and get a text you can‚Äôt respond or browse the Internet really quick without disconnecting and reconnecting. Couldn‚Äôt design something that doesn‚Äôt do that? I guess it‚Äôs apparently too difficult. Light works well, but the annoyance with Bluetooth it‚Äôs just a pain so it‚Äôs inconvenient.

Revised review: I opened the new light that was sent to me and it was perfect. Im now giving 5 stars. The company even called to make sure I was satisfied with the new light. I will definitely be ordering from this company again.Seems to be a nice light, but a few of the orange covers that go on the light were mismatched . It looks as if they ran out of a certain brand and had to use whatever was left. I called and another one was sent to me with no hesitation. I returned the defective one. I haven't opened the new one yet.

I just want to start off by saying that I do an extensive search and research before I purchase any products. This light was no exception. I looked online, searched reviews on YouTube and other websites. Most companies want over a couple hundred plus for the same light or equivalent. However, after reading the reviews, looking at photos, and catching it on sale for $109. I‚Äôm completely happy. Easy set up, came with instructions, a carry bag, all accessories, it‚Äôs dimmable, attachments for camera or other recording or video set accessories, adjustable with a very tall extension, you can bend it slightly, and it works for a small or large area. I have a YouTube channel that I‚Äôll be starting shortly (Quinita Charnell) and I‚Äôm happy to make this a part of my lighting system! Buy it! You‚Äôll love it too!

So far this ring light has been great. It was a little more difficult to put together than I thought it would be, but it‚Äôs great once it‚Äôs together. I was disappointed about is the phone bracket does not hold my phone so I had to order another bracket which luckily, worked with the tripod. It‚Äôs not easy to take apart and store in the bag but I made do. The light is definitely VERY bright so if you are using the front facing camera for videos or selfies, the light can definitely hurt your eyes but it is a great light and stand. I would recommend it.

This ring light is amazing for what I paid. It comes with a ton of accessories to get the job done. They only setback is my phone does not hold securely or safely in the holder. It has fallen out a couple of times. If that's fixed this is perfect for people who need to jump on camera without a lot of tech involved.
Exceptionally bright. Dimmable. I was missing a piece adapter piece for the phone attachment etc. and will be reaching out to see if I can have it shipped out but other wise amazing

I like the product but after a month or so I notice some things. One day one of the bulbs or something just randomly poped. It scared me! The light is totally bright. I take good picture with it.This is my review again! It's March 14th and my light will not come on!! I don't over use my light and I wasted money!!

I bought this ring light over 1 year ago and this September will make it the second year, although at first I was scared it would not last this long, I was wrong! I use this light basically every day for hours at a time and it has never failed me!  I use this ring light to record makeup videos as well as better lighting when doing a client's hair and makeup.( For brighter lighting I do not use the white and orange color filters)

I loved this initially. However, it completely stopped working after one year and I didn't even use it a lot, maybe twice a month! I was so disappointed. This light ring makes it easy to take very high quality photographs of objects. Cheap stand and parts. Wouldn't stand up wouldn't hold camera or phone. Plugs do not fit and light keeps shutting off as a result. Tried to send it back but threw out the box.Updated:

I bought this ring light a few weeks ago to help improve the lighting of my videos and it really came through with its quality! The set-up was very easy, even without the instructions it was pretty self explanatory on what goes where. The plastic light covers snap on and off with ease so that it‚Äôs not a huge hassle to change your lighting. If anything seems wobbly or loose, just remember to tighten up the adjustment screws and it‚Äôll be sturdy. Lastly, I like how everything can be carried in the portable storage bag. It looks very professional and the foam padding inside makes sure nothing gets too damaged.Overall, I‚Äôm pretty happy with my purchase!

Most everything was good but one thing that bothers me is the power chord is sensitive. If the power box part in the middle of the chord is not laying completely flat on the ground or some surface, the ring light won‚Äôt turn on. One slight bend of the chord seems to cut off the power completely (Hopefully this makes sense I suck at describing these things with electrical stuff). I had thought it came broken or defective when I tried testing it so felt the need to let people know. Otherwise, I honestly love it. For the price this is good and really made a difference to my lighting quality!

I'm not even going to go into the issues I had with this. My first ring light didn't work, I needed it for a quick photography session for my inventory. There was something lose in the ring of the light and it wouldn't turn on. Sent an email because I was on a time crunch. Seller told me hold off doing anything, and then were apparently on holiday. Then they told me to order a replacement through Amazon. Holding my business up for at least a week. The replacement that was sent was just crappy quality. Not at all sturdy. And the lighting was weird.

I recently purchased the 18 inch ring light.  I was a bit disappointed when I found out that it didn‚Äôt include all pieces shown in the manual.  However the can be purchased if needed.  The assembly took about 15minutes- for easy to put together.  The ring light and stand that came with it are very sturdy, very impressed with that.  The right light included two different colored filters, one is white and the other is orange.  It also included a travel bag two ac/dc adapters, one for the U.S.  and U.K.  A Bluetooth remoter shutter button (box was damaged-not a big deal.) and an smart phone holder- I believe this will work with any smart phone.  Over all I‚Äôm very pleased, the ring light has a dimmer which goes from subtly to extreme. The ring light comes with a soft tube to add some flexibility.  When I tried bending it it was a lil difficult but worked.  The connection for the ac/dc adapters looked good no damage, however the cord to attach it to looked to be misshaped? It still works and turns to lock.  Photos attached.

I've had a couple months to use this light and it still gets 5 stars. I've used boxlights and such for my videos for quite a while. This light has completely changed the quality of my video. My only regret is that I didn't buy one sooner.Only one complaint and it doesn't lose a star because of it: the piece that you attach to your camera and to the light is VERY flimsy, constantly comes loose, and doesn't like to adjust easily. However, once you've got everything framed properly, it does a good job staying in place. Pretty annoying, but I love the light so much I don't really care.

1.)  light switch not working after 3 months of occasional use 2.) the ‚Äúlight ring‚Äù is not steady on the stand and falls to the side or frontwards or backwards sometimes...it‚Äôs unsteady on the stand. Amazon customer service has been exceptional.

Giving this three stars for now because the soft tube was missing and Amazon had to send a full replacement (shipping the missing item wasn‚Äôt an option). And while the assembly instructions appeared simple, I had to search online for a video to assemble. There are a few steps not listed in instructions. Will update review when I get the replacement, reassemble and ship the other parts back.

it would‚Äôve been 5 stars, but unfortunately my color filters didn‚Äôt fit correctly when I placed them onto the stand. They would overlap on each other and start to fall off. I just returned them and hope to get a full refund .
I love it!!!!! I‚Äôm a cosmetologist , and the other stylist love my new light. Once I learned how to use different tricks I was pleased. Would and do recommend this product.

This light is really bright and I like that it has two different gels. I sometimes find myself blinking due to the brightness but it has a button that let's you adjust the dimming up or down. Other than that it's durable and raises really hight too so I can record standing. All in all I really like it.

This product was excellent the first time I turned it on.  The problem being it would never turn on again!  I packed the first one up and returned it. My neewer lamp lasted through hurricane Maria and got to Puerto Rico unscathed and then moved with me to FL unscathed! I work WONDERS! I purchased this ring light for the use of photography for my eBay business. I‚Äôve been using it for clothing photography and it is really nice. I‚Äôve always wanted a ring light! According to a bunch of websites on google, this is the best ring light on the market! Honestly, If I get hit in the head one more time by this thing I might end up with a concussion. I wasn‚Äôt going to leave a review because the light works. These items seemed to be all packaged in a way that they wouldn't have anything to rub against to get the scratches, which is why I say it was used by someone else before I received it.I purchased because of the amount of good reviews and overall rating, though it was a bit more than I was wanting to spend.

I love that it arrived on time&it was very easy to put together,but for some reason once I turned it off the wen to turn it back on it was low lighting&I had to turn it off&on a few times just for it to finally come all the way on&now it wont come on at all.Im not happy about this,I really needed this light because I do hair now I have to send it back& re-order itüôÑ.But over all it was good for the time I was able to use it

Don‚Äôt waste your money. This ring light started out great but regrettably it has completely failed after only marginal use in the first year of ownership. It's not a sturdy product. I was missing an item when I received this product in the mail.  But the emails from the company seemed to be generic answers so my problem wasn't resolved. I literally just received this in the mail, and I‚Äôm so excited. I just finished assembling it, which was quite easy to do once I followed instructions. I use it for my YouTube and it makes my videos 10 times better. I love it

Can't find anything bad about this light! Perfect for my makup tutorials, selfies and pictures.  I can't believe how much it improved all my content just by turning it on. Apparently a TON of these are defective. Don't order unless you enjoy the prospect of having to return this giant box and then get a replacement that may also not work. Now am wondering how many of the 5-star reviews are fake. Appears to be VERY low quality.

I was hesitant due to price so this item was on my wish list for some time. However, as my business grows I feel it's essential to have. This item is a game  changer for video and photography. Let me just say if you‚Äôre thinking about purchasing this item do it NOW! Exactly what I hoped for ! I do YouTube videos and when you‚Äôre doing this makeup videos it‚Äôs super important to have good lighting and this was it ! 10/10 !

Hands down one of the best knocks offs. Even though its led. It gives you life. I will update more later with pictures and video. This came with instructions which a lot of people said it didn‚Äôt. The quality is amazing! Everything works perfectly it‚Äôs very customizable. This is more than worth the price I bought it when I was putting together my wife‚Äôs makeup area and she loved it!

First, let me say that I needed this ring light since I have a FB Live broadcast and use a green screen for various background displays. I have been waiting for this ring light for about one month. I ordered the product one month prior so I can have professional headshots done for my graduation and work. I really loved my new Ring Light. At first when I opened the stand, I thought it is installed upside down but then figured out No, that's the way the packaged it. muy contento con ete produccto era l oque esperaba, buena calidad del tripode, los accesorios muy buenos, muy estables

This light is soo good! I got it on sale so it was even better! The light gets so bright that I have to squint when Im looking at it but you get to tune the brightness with a twist of the knob. The stand itself is pretty good quality and was easy to assemble.  The orange filters make your skin look horrible, I am not sure why they did not give us blue or pink - orange is not good at all. Well, hallelujah for some light on the subject! The light was easy to assemble, even an anxiety ridden, virtual elementary Art teacher can do it! Love this ring light!! Was super easy to set up! Works great!! Gave it 4 stars because in the description, it claims to have a ‚Äúgood neck‚Äù, the neck does NOT MOVE what so ever! Which I was bummed about. The phone mount is cheap, I feel like it‚Äôll break every time I try to mount my phone (iPhone 11 Pro Max). Other than those two things this is an amazing product!! I was a bit nervous ordering this, because some people said it came broken but mine came working and package very nicely! Came in a box inside of a box inside of a bag! I received this at the end of January and used it one time for a virtual event a month later. Two weeks ago I went to go use it and it wouldn't turn on.  I've taken it apart and put it back together. This light it powerful enough to light a room or a subject up close and personal. The handy dial makes it easy to dial up the soft light for portrait features on stills and video.  On portraits this light is amazing minimizing the subject of any skin flaws  and brightening the eyes making you job easier in post. Great for vlogging or video calls on those days you look tired. I previously posted the stand was missing. It was my mistake as the carrying bag it comes with does not fit the stand and they had become separated unbeknownst to me. The light is great. Just what I was expecting. It does brilliant lighting. BUT I thought it came with a shoe to attach a camera? Mine only had one for a phone.Maybe this light is only designed for people shooting with their phone.  Pretty disappointing I will have to use two tripods. A shame because the light itself is great.

Being locked up in my house for so long has really brought out the gamer in me.  I started streaming and wanted to make sure my setup looked professional.  This light really did the trick and makes my not so expensive webcam shine.  Can't imagine a better light source for full face lighting.  Highly recommend if you're a streamer looking to improve your camera lighting.

I use it for taking pictures and the lighting is good but I couldn‚Äôt get it to hold my phone (iPhone max) vertically or horizontally. I use to use the single Glamcor light for lashing & found that my before & after pictures to be too dark and didn‚Äôt really showcase my work. I also love that I don‚Äôt have to strain my eyes anymore bc this product gives out so much light. You can also adjust how bright you want it to be. I absolutely love this ring light! I've used it for modeling sports gear, celebrating my friends birthday party and setup a photo booth. The Bluetooth button makes it so everyone can be involved as well as having a great background. I had been using some shop lights for my streaming setup for the past year or so and finally wanted to retire them and get something more professional. The brightness adjustment lets me change it depending on the time of day and everyone in my stream immediately noticed that my video quality was better.  Great light at a very affordable price!

Big upgrade for my YouTube videos.  Lots of room for adjustments and color with the filters.  The unit feels well made and the stand is nice and sturdy with good height adjustment.  Mount is great for my camera and the video's I've made with it are much better than I expected.  Extremely happy with this light.

Perfect for social media & youtube videos! I can work during the night without worrying about not having enough lighting. This is perfect lighting all on its own. LOVE THIS! I wanted to get a light set up, so that I was able to film videos at night or in an area that is not right in front of a window. This light set up works super well and is very bright. This is a bright light and highly adjustable. The issue I have is that if I adjust it to be as tall as I want it to be, which isn't even as tall as it goes, it falls over because it is so top heavy. Although there may be many harsh, 1-Star, reviews on here, what I just got in the mail was near perfect! The, literal, only negative thing about my package was that the Bluetooth shutter remote was, very obviously, opened and used prior to my having it, but it still works, so it's not that bad, in my opinion.If you're in the market for a cheaper LED ring light, I'd say go with this one.

This ring light was purchased to build a diy photobooth and made a huge difference when taking pictures with the iPad. This can get really bright and worked out well for us since our wedding was a dim environment. The carrying case also made it easy to package most of our photobooth items all together.
Has a short in my cord only used it twice and I always leave it in the carrying bag. Very sad that I spent so much and it doesn‚Äôt work properly

Very disappointing amount of bright white light. I was hoping for something VERY strong that would cast a BRIGHT light and this only goes up to a somewhat brighter photo. It‚Äôs not intense, if that‚Äôs what you‚Äôre looking for.

I'm in LOVE with this product. It's larger than you'd think. Taller than you'd think. And pretty sturdy considering the price. It gets verrrrry bright. I would say to buy a diffuser. this light exceeded my expectations!!! I LOVE the way it looks when i do LIVE videos and take pictures!

I like this light, but the outside plastic filters don't connect and they're constantly falling off. It's a sturdy light and stand. And the light is adjustable making it great for any photography situation. I like it has a carrying case and it's easy to take apart and put together

Best lighting I've ever used and it's no wonder once you see how the set up makes everything easier to shoot with as well. I got this ring light to film for my YouTube channel and this works well the lighting is great. Do not have anything bad to say about this ring light. I also like the fact it came with a travel bag which is great for when I travel I can take it with me. Thanks

I haven‚Äôt recorded with this yet, but I can already tell it‚Äôs exactly what I‚Äôve been missing in my videos! I installed the white diffuser first because I do makeup tutorials. I love this ring light. It‚Äôs an economical light that is very versatile. I can use it straight on or as a key light to the side. Have been using this light for two weeks, not a very long time so based on my limited using experience with it, I have nothing to fault about it. I've been working on improving my YouTube videos over the past year and wanted to get some better lighting to compliment them. This is my favorite purchase from amazon. I went from getting 1-2 dates a month on tinder to 8-9! It is a bit large to carry around so people will likely be a little disappointed in person if they have only seen you in pictures

Worked great for a year. Then it stopped working. I have called the phone number twice and left messages and have even emailed them. I have yet to hear a response.

Im still getting used to using it. When it comes, it arrives in a large box that includes everything described in the description. Note that it comes in a box, that's in a box. The main box has a handle for carrying the thing around wherever you want.

This item was great for a few months, except the phone adapter is very cumbersome and a few times my iPhone fell right out of the stand! This purchase was honestly the biggest disappointment. The tripod structure is completely unsteady and falls over easily (I set it up right, I checked multiple times). The ring light can't be tightly  secured to the stand either so it's super wobbly. The light also can't tilt to sides easily so it's super unpractical and difficult to use.

it does a very good job for my product photography. i wish it was a little bit more powerful but overall i am very happy with the purchase. the light is good and the case that comes with it is very useful.

This light will change not only the way you light your shoots but will change the way you shoot as well. Easy assembly on the stand and placement mounting. Perfectly centered lighting, color options with the filters and it dims and brightens with gradual tuning so it adjusts slightly to get it just right, which I really like. The metal piece that connects the tripod to the ring light with 2 set screws is to small for the tubing so it gets wobbly once you attach the ring light. makes it impossible to mount camera straight and you have to compensate by mounting the camera crooked.

I would‚Äôve given the light 5 stars but the wire that enters the adapter is lose so i have to repeatedly push it in for it to work !! Other than that it‚Äôs The best light ever I‚Äôm in love with it ‚ù§Ô∏è Assemble was Easy and light is great quality!! It‚Äôs definitely worth 100 dollars

Easy to assemble but the whole thing does not fit in the included bag. I would prefer that the light and the tripod fit in the bag together but instead, only the light fits. Kind of a pain as I do pack it up and take it places. Works great.

First try with a light ring. I‚Äôm happy with the tri pod  as I use it for real estate and it helps me get a great room angle! Nice bag for carrying and the remote is handy. New iPhone 11 fits super tight, takes some work to get it in the bracket. Works well.

This light is wonderful. Living in the Pacific Northwest it is really great to use on gray days for all kinds of work, not just photography. Highly recommend. It is easy to take down and store in its padded carrying case.

works just as intended and even more but man make sure you want a big light becuase not reading ehen i got it, it was huge compared  to my other ring light but that isn't  a bad thing just something  to keep in mind

The selection of ring lights on here can be quite overwhelming but look no further than this, this brand is the answer. Amazing light!!! Super easy to put together and the dimmer range is great. My only complaint is that it‚Äôs VERY top heavy. If you adjust the light forward the feet won‚Äôt stay on the ground and the whole thing tips. Over all it‚Äôs a great light, I highly recommend it :-)

I've been using my ring light for about 2 weeks and I love it! Easy to assemble and the lighting is AWESOME. I initially  received the package with a missing accessory (the blueetooth remote). Customer service contacted me right away and took care of it. THANK YOU!

I received this as a gift and love it. It‚Äôs exactly what I was looking for. I read reviews about no directions which is unfortunate. I really like this ring light, a lot.  I got it to use while working on nails, and it‚Äôs perfect.  I have a bright, shadowless work area and I can see all the small details much better now. But based off the quality of the light and the case, I suspect they are also quite good.
